amendment.description: To ensure that legislation is not enacted that increases the number of taxpayers affected by the alternative minimum tax.

action.text: Amendment SA 2765 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2765 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 53. Record Vote Number: 49.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2765.

Amendment SA 2765 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S2630-2631, S2646-2647; text: CR S2630-2631) To ensure that legislation is not enacted that increases the number of taxpayers affected by the alternative minimum tax.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2765 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 53. Record Vote Number: 49.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2765 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
